about_the_game:
***PRE-RELEASE*******0.0.1
thank you for all your patience discord link has been updated we are looking six months away from having a playable game there will be updates in the next couple of months to make the game actual playable thank you for your patience and I'm looking forward to seeing you guys in discord and getting your opinion on what can make this game more enjoyable going to take the communities input to try and make this something that is fun for all can't make a high end game but I can make something enjoyable hopefully



Prepare to navigate the unknown, for in Last Contingency, the ultimate triumph lies not just in survival, but in embracing the untamed, exhilarating journey that dares you to outlast, outthink, and outplay. This is more than a game—it's your legacy, your conquest, and your Last Contingency."
detailed_description:
***PRE-RELEASE*******0.0.1
thank you for all your patience discord link has been updated we are looking six months away from having a playable game there will be updates in the next couple of months to make the game actual playable thank you for your patience and I'm looking forward to seeing you guys in discord and getting your opinion on what can make this game more enjoyable going to take the communities input to try and make this something that is fun for all can't make a high end game but I can make something enjoyable hopefully



Prepare to navigate the unknown, for in Last Contingency, the ultimate triumph lies not just in survival, but in embracing the untamed, exhilarating journey that dares you to outlast, outthink, and outplay. This is more than a game—it's your legacy, your conquest, and your Last Contingency."
name: Last Contingency

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core processor (Ryzen 3 3100 OR core i5 7400)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD [R9 290] OR Nvidia [gtx 970]
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: running the game with playable frame rates!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: hex-core processor AMD[Ryzen 5 3600] Intel [Core i5-9600K]
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia gtx 1660 6gb OR AMD rx580 8gb
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: running the game much more smoothly with higher fps!

short_description: Dive into the epic realm of Last Contingency, a masterful fusion of heart-pounding gunplay inspired by 'Escape from Tarkov,' intricate crafting dynamics reminiscent of 'Rust,' and the immersive, lifelike farming experience of 'Farming Simulator.' In
